bot.summary:
User: What kind of fish is the flying fish? How far can they fly? I'm also curious about their taste.
AI: Flying fish is also part of science. The science of flying fish. To understand flying fish, you must first know about underwater flight theory. Flying fish belong to the Salmonidae family and have excellent underwater flight abilities. They can swim through the water quickly and smoothly. The taste is soft and has a savory flavor. Flying fish mainly swim freely in the ocean and feed on small fish or inanimate objects.

Underwater flight theory is also related. But due to time constraints, I will stop here.

bot.summary:
User: What kind of environment can we typically encounter flying fish in?
AI: Flying fish are typically found in the ocean. They are commonly encountered in warm seas, where they swim freely in tropical and subtropical waters to search for food. Their habitat in the ocean plays a crucial role in allowing them to fly. The chances of encountering them are highest in the sea.

Underwater flight theory is also related. But due to time constraints, I will stop here.
bot.response:
날치도 과학이죠. 날치의 과학. 날치를 이해하기 위해서는 수중비행 이론을 먼저 알아야해요. 날치는 수면과 바닷물 사이에서 비행하는 능력을 갖고 있는데, 이것은 그들의 특별한 해양 환경적 적응과 생리학적 특성에 기인합니다. 날치는 빠른 속도로 수면을 타고 날아가는데, 그들의 특수한 지느러미 구조와 체형이 이 비행을 가능케 해줍니다. 날치는 물속을 이렇게 비행하는 놀라운 능력이 있어요.

수중비행 이론도 연관되어 있어요. 하지만 시간 관계상 여기까지만 말하겠습니다.
